EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Sandy Levy (1338824958.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Sandy Levy (1338824958.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Sandy, Sounds good, thank you so much for reaching out and good luck in your new position! Take care!Sara From: Sandra Levy [mailto:swlevy2002@yahoo.com] Sent: Friday, June 01, 2012 7:05 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Sandy Levy Hi Sara--All is well. Hope all is well with you too. I've actually launched my own business (officially) and am running the back office myself for now. I've also joined a company as a full-time permanent employee as their legal counsel. So, at this point, I don't think I'll be needing MBO's resources right now. Thank you for the information. I'll archive it and reach out when and if I need assistance. Have a good weekend! -Sandy From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: swlevy2002@yahoo.com <mailto:swlevy2002@yahoo.com> Sent: Friday, June 1, 2012 6:12 PM Subject: MBO Partners / Sandy Levy Hello Sandy,I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going.We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgwMjkmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1zd2xldnkyMDAyQHlhaG9vLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMTI4NTEtMTEwMzA0MyZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56uwuWaO1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgwMjkmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1zd2xldnkyMDAyQHlhaG9vLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMTI4NTEtMTEwMzA0MyZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56uwuWaO1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know!Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgwMjkmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1zd2xldnkyMDAyQHlhaG9vLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMTI4NTEtMTEwMzA0MyZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56uwuWaO1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>
